name: Call It A Day
description:
### How To Play:

- W, A, S, D to move

- Left click to interact/throw

- Find your key pass at night

- Run from vengeful spirits comes day

___

Well, let’s just say that Grimmy isn’t exactly a favorite candidate - in anything really. First he lost his job, then he lost his life, then he lost his job again in the afterlife. Now that he’s gotten up on his feet and landed himself an internship at the prestigious Purgatory - as a grim reaper no less. But let’s not celebrate too early, because he’s lost his scythe first day at the job. These lost souls won’t go reap themselves, so Grimmy must do his job with bare hands. But be careful though! Grimmy’s big on work-life balance, and he simply won’t work overtime. You’ll know what that means.

___
